casebody.data:
Gary Dellinger, Virginia Dellinger, and Timothy S. Dellinger, Petitioners
v.
Lincoln County, Lincoln County Board of Commissioners, and Strata Solar, LLC, Respondents
and
Timothy P. Mooney, Martha Mclean, and The Sailview Owners Association, Intervenor Respondents No. 311P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Forrest A. Ferrell, Attorney at Law, Jason White, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Dellinger, Gary, et al. Wesley L. Deaton, Attorney at Law, for Lincoln County, et al. James E. Scarbrough, Attorney at Law, John F. Scarbrough, Attorney at Law, for Mooney, Timothy P., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of August 2016 by Intervenor Respondents in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
